name: SpaceRangerJetFighter
description:
SpaceRangerJetFighter! Help Captain Ryu Star keep the galaxy safe from an Evil Space WarLord!

Joystick to move character left and right. X button for FireBallPunch. Y Button to Jump. Hold down B Button and use Joystick to Use Flaming Rooster Punch. While holding the B Button you can move faster and jump higher and deal more damage to enemies. Enter vehicles by jumping into the driver's seat. Use the A Button to pilot vehicles. If you take too much damage you will respawn by a checkpoint or the last vehicle you used. if you lose a life while driving the character will flash loudly to indicate you have lost a life. When this happens press A button to reset conrol of the vehicle. Player Jets and enemy Jets fire projectiles using the B Button. Flashing Energy Boxes with the Green Plus give you an extra life. If you find a portal or Warp Gate you can enter it by pressing UP in front of it. ESC button Pauses the game.

Hint: Each level top and a bottom with secrets and Enemies. Can you find the Warlords' Spaceships and defeat them?

Note: The game was made with a Xbox360controller. If you have a different style controller try using JoyToKey program.
